item.title: The Man Behind Amazon's Robot Army Wants Everyone to Have an AI-Powered Helper
item.description: Brad Porter helped Amazon deploy an army of warehouse robots. His new creation—Proxie—could help other companies embrace more automation.

item.title: 12 Best Turntables (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Streaming music giving you the blues? These record players will help you rock on to analog audio at home.

item.title: Insta360 Link 2 Review: A Cheaper, Better Webcam
item.description: This second-generation motorized webcam makes steady improvements across the board.

item.title: 8 Best MagSafe Wallets (2024), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: These convenient and slim magnetic wallets stick to the back of your smartphone.

item.title: The Best Cooling Sheets for Hot Sleepers, Tested and Reviewed (2024)
item.description: If you tend to wake up sweating no matter the season, hop under these cooling sheets so that you can, you know, actually sleep.
